attributes.action: Let pupils go to toilet in schools when required norfolk
attributes.additional_details: Change the rules so pupils can go to the toilet during lesson times when they need to
attributes.background: Change the rules to Allow pupils in Norfolk schools to go to the toilet when needed it's their basic human rights

rejection.details:
Decisions on policies regarding when students can leave the classroom are a matter for individual schools and teachers, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are unhappy with how a school or teacher deals with requests to use the toilet, you should raise this with the school or relevant local authority.
